Since the ampliﬁcation of the stimulated emission imposes high demands on the active medium,
lead-free perovskites are still not widely implemented in lasing systems. In 2016, Guichuan Xing et al.
] on NIR lasing from tin-based perovskite. They showed that tin-based
Br, I) surprisingly possess exceptional optical gain properties in the

This work conﬁrmed the possibility of lead-free perovskites implementation in the lightning and lasing
